title: STAT+: Arrowhead’s gene-silencing drugs cut fat in early obesity studies
description: Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals said Tuesday that its gene-silencing candidates helped people with obesity lose fat.
content: Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals said Tuesday that its gene-silencing candidates helped people with obesity lose fat.
